availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Klein (Newport, Campbell County, Kentucky, tailor.)

body.p: Newport, Campbell County, Kentucky, tailor. Native of the Grand Duchy of Hesse. Married to Mary Ann Enseviler Klein. Father of John Henry Klein, Anna Klein, Adolph Klein, Edward Klein, F. G. Klein, and George Klein. Tailor in Newport, Campbell County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 565.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 462A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994030, Campbell County Births, p. 104.
"John Klein (1821-1895)," Find A Grave, Memorial #88681590, accessed May 26, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/88681590.
